api_list.name: Articles
api_list.description: Get news articles relevant for a given query.

optional_parameters.name: media
optional_parameters.description: Comma separated list of medias e.g (bbc,NYtimes)

optional_parameters.name: to
optional_parameters.description: to_ accept the following format of date: %Y-%m-%d For example, 2022-06-01

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: Specify the number of articles you want to return (Max is 10)

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: from_ accept the following format of date: %Y-%m-%d For example, 2022-04-01

optional_parameters.name: category
optional_parameters.description: Comma separated list of categories e.g(Sport,Politic)
